content.description: Number of Olympic Athletes by Gender, 1896 to 2016
content.question: The trend in female participation in Olympic Games, as shown in the graph, is most similar to which of the following trends in the twentieth century?

choices.label: Women having three or more children

topic.text: 9.5: Calls for Reform and Responses after 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
